Public NotInheritable Class RandomFourierFeaturizingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: Maps vector columns to a feature space where the inner products approximate a user specified shift-invariant kernel. The kernel is indicated by specifying a instance. The available implementations are and . This transformation is based on this paper by Rahimi and Recht.
